野火期间长期护理机构的室内空气质量如何？比你想象的还要糟糕。每年，美国西部和加拿大的野火都会向天空喷出滚滚浓烟。当烟雾吹进爱达荷州西南部的宝藏谷时，博伊西地区的居民笼罩在肮脏的空气中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Whate28099s-indoor-air-quality-like-in-long-term-care-facilities-during-wildfires-Worse-than-youe28099d-think.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Whate28099s-indoor-air-quality-like-in-long-term-care-facilities-during-wildfires-Worse-than-youe28099d-think.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2603db00-2630-4937-a380-808032b3cd2a Tue, 23 Jan 2024 05:47:49 -0500 What’s indoor air quality like in long-term care facilities during wildfires? Worse than you’d think.
